question: At the beginning of the conference, there were 34 lawyers and 18 artists. After 45 minutes, 1/4 of the total number of people left. How many artists are left if 30 lawyers stayed at the conference?
answer:
There were a total of 34 lawyers + 18 artists = <<34+18=52>>52 people who attended the conference.
After 45 minutes, 52 people * 1/4 = <<52*1/4=13>>13 people left the conference.
This means 52 people - 13 people = <<52-13=39>>39 people stayed.
Out of the 39 who stayed, 39 people - 30 lawyers = <<39-30=9>>9 were artists.
#### 9
